Text: Families Against Corporate Killers (FACK) is a nonprofit organisation based in the UK which campaigns on behalf of families bereaved by workplace deaths.

Triplets:<Families Against Corporate Killers
1:
--------------------
<Text: Families Against Corporate Killers:  It was founded in July 2006 by members of the Bereaved by Work North West support group and the Greater Manchester Hazards Centre.>
Triplets:<Families Against Corporate Killers
Bereaved by Work North West support group
2:
--------------------
Text: Families Against Corporate Killers:  The organisation campaigns for increased funding for the enforcement of health and safety law and changes to the Corporate Manslaughter and Corporate Homicide Act 2007 - which currently only imposes financial penalties - to make directors criminally responsible for health and safety offences with the possibility of imprisonment.
